item.title: Random || Not Random # 355: Line
item.description:
736 lines drawn through each origin in one of 1 direction(s) with lengths chosen from 3 size(s).

$$ s = .00047887, \; $$ $$ | \lbrace \theta \rbrace | = 1, $$ $$ | \lbrace r \rbrace | = 3,$$ $$ r_0 = 0.0000,$$ $$ R = 4.00, $$ $$r \sim \beta(1.082, 1.249), $$ $$\theta \sim \beta(1.000, 1.000). $$
